SELECT SEQ_PET.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO TBL_PET(ID, MEMBER_ID, PET_IMAGE, PET_NAME, PET_KIND, PET_GENDER, PET_BREED, PET_BIRTH, PET_WEIGHT, PET_NEUTER, PET_VET) VALUES(SEQ_PET.NEXTVAL, #{memberId}, #{petImage}, #{petName}, #{petKind}, #{petGender}, #{petBreed}, TO_DATE(#{petBirth}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{petWeight}, #{petNeuter}, #{petVet})
mapper.select: SELECT TP.ID, TP.MEMBER_ID, TP.PET_KIND, TP.PET_IMAGE, TP.PET_NAME, TP.PET_GENDER, TP.PET_BREED, TP.PET_BIRTH, TP.PET_VET, TP.PET_WEIGHT, TP.PET_NEUTER, TP.PET_COLOR, TM.MEMBER_EMAIL, TM.MEMBER_NAME FROM TBL_PET TP JOIN TBL_MEMBER TM ON TP.MEMBER_ID = TM.ID

SELECT TP.ID, TP.MEMBER_ID, TP.PET_KIND, TP.PET_IMAGE, TP.PET_NAME, TP.PET_GENDER, TP.PET_BREED, TP.PET_BIRTH, TP.PET_VET, TP.PET_WEIGHT, TP.PET_NEUTER, TP.PET_COLOR, TM.MEMBER_EMAIL, TM.MEMBER_NAME FROM TBL_PET TP JOIN TBL_MEMBER TM ON TP.MEMBER_ID = TM.ID AND TP.ID = #{id}
